characters.name: Hanabi Yasuraoka
characters.description:
At the beginning of the story she's in love with Narumi Kanai, her childhood friend who is now her teacher. She immediately realizes that Narumi is in love with Akane Minagawa and not her. She meets Mugi Awaya, who is in love with Akane, and starts a relationship with him to satisfy each other's loneliness.

She has different attitudes with each character: she's cheerful with Sanae Ebato, her best friend, timid with Narumi Kanai and sincere with Mugi because she trusts him a lot.

characters.name: Mugi Awaya
characters.description: He falls in love with Akane Mikagawa accepting the fact he has no chance of making her his. He is shown to be emotionless and revealed minimum expression, but as the story goes on, things start to change. He also shows a caring side for the ones close to him. Moka, a childhood friend, has deep feelings for Mugi, but he denies her feelings for him because he knows well he would ruin her.

characters.name: Akane Minagawa
characters.description: Akane Minagawa is a music teacher at Hanabi's school. She hides her true personality with a "mask" at the beginning of the story, but it's clear to see that she is very manipulative and takes pride in hurting others. ~!She is a compulsive cheater who would sleep with anyone to make her feel better about herself. She likes the feeling of being wanted and needed by someone. With that being said, both Mugi and Narumi fall in love with her, she doesn't mind playing with men and toying with their feelings.!~

characters.name: Sanae Ebato
characters.description: Sanae is introduced to the series as the best friend of the main character, Hanabi. She is shown to be a supportive character in the beginning, but when they're alone, she tends to be very possessive. ~!Her ill feelings towards men began when she was almost molested by a man on the train, although saved by Hanabi, leaving her scared. Sanae begins to have romantic feelings towards Hanabi as the story progresses.!~

characters.name: Narumi Kanai
characters.description: Narumi Kanai is amicable and benign. He is also a teacher at hanabi's school, who he cares deeply about but never views her relationship wise, more like a precious little sister. ~!Narumi appeared to fall in love with Akane, although he knew that she had a hobby of sleeping with other men. He is prepared to cherish her for the rest of his life even if she cheats on him, he just cares about her happiness.!~

characters.name: Noriko Kamomebata
characters.description: Noriko Kamomebata or as she likes to be called, Moka, is shown to be childish and whiney. Her appearance is intended to make her look like a princess who is in need of a "prince". Mugi is her childhood friend who she fell in love with. Although she may be annoying, she seems to care for others and like to see them happy. Her size makes her look younger than she actually is.

characters.name: Takuya Terauchi
characters.description:
One of Akane's former students who is in a physical relationship with her. Hanabi approaches him in an attempt to make Akane jealous, but she realizes that she is unable to repeat Akane's behavior.

(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Mei Hayakawa
characters.description:
Mugi's senior at high school. Mugi turned to her after being unable to initially confess to Akane and they had sex. Afterwards, Mei apologizes to Mugi for rushing him into it.

(Source: Wikipedia)
